item.title: Netanyahu calls Pope Leo XIV after deadly Israeli strike on Gazan church
item.description: Benjamin Netanyahu called Pope Leo XIV on Friday after Israel's deadly attack on a Catholic church in Gaza, the Vatican said.

item.title: In win for Trump, House approves $9B in spending cuts -- including USAID cuts
item.description: Murkowski said on Wednesday that she still opposes the bill after voting on Tuesday against advancing it forward.

item.title: Democrats press Trump administration on US deal with El Salvador to detain migrants
item.description: The letter calls on officials to turn over any agreements between the U.S. and El Salvador regarding the detaining of migrants at the notorious CECOT ...

item.title: WATCH: AG Pam Bondi visits Alcatraz for briefing after Trump's order to reopen prison
item.description: Attorney General Pam Bondi visited Alcatraz on Thursday to assess the viability of reopening the infamous prison.

item.title: WATCH: Committee advances former Trump attorney for key appeals court role
item.description: Democrats walked out of the Senate Judiciary Committee before Republicans voted to advance Pres. Trump's nomination of Emil Bove.
